#Objects

A point
B point
C point
D point
E point
F point
G point

LAB line
LGF line
LDF line
LEF line

CC circle
CD circle
CE circle

#Relations
end_points(A,B,LAB)
end_points(G,F,LGF)
coincident(C,LAB)

centre(C,CC)
coincident(D,LAB)
coincident(E,LAB)
coincident(D,CC)
coincident(E,CC)
not_coincident(D,E)

centre(D,CD)
coincident(E,CD)
coincident(F,CD)
coincident(G,CD)

centre(E,CE)
coincident(D,CE)
coincident(F,CE)
coincident(G,CE)

end_points(D,F,LDF)
end_points(E,F,LEF)
length_equal(LDF,LEF)
